title: Parametric Resonance in Plasma-Seeded Hypersonic Flow
topic_summary: Explores how acoustic momentum transfer in plasma-seeded hypersonic flows achieves efficiency through parametric resonance at specific frequency ratios, enabling strong control with weak inputs and highlighting design trade-offs.
target_audience: Aerospace engineers and plasma physicists studying hypersonic flow control and magnetohydrodynamic interactions.

scenes.title: Threshold Introduction
scenes.narration_summary: Introduces the threshold condition where acoustic pressure ratio times frequency ratio reaches 0.05-0.1 for effective momentum transfer.
scenes.animations: 3D parameter space with parametric surface rising to threshold ridge, color gradients, and glowing contour plane (as detailed in user-provided description).

scenes.title: Resonance Mechanism
scenes.narration_summary: Explains parametric resonance driving coherent ionic oscillations with 10-50x amplification.
scenes.animations: Ionic oscillation visualization with vector field on spherical plasma model, frequency-matching arrows, and amplification scale bars.

scenes.title: Counterintuitive Efficiency
scenes.narration_summary: Demonstrates weak acoustic pressure at right frequency outperforming strong pressure at wrong frequency.
scenes.animations: Dual bar charts comparing efficiency vs. pressure/frequency, with animated transitions showing peak at resonance condition.

scenes.title: Design Tradeoff
scenes.narration_summary: Describes binary optimization requiring precise resonance tuning or accepting 10x control penalty.
scenes.animations: Optimization landscape with resonance peak, penalty zone visualization, and tuning parameter sliders.

scenes.title: Traditional vs. Parametric
scenes.narration_summary: Contrasts monotonic 'more power' approach with non-monotonic parametric mechanism.
scenes.animations: Side-by-side comparison plots: linear power curve vs. resonant peak curve with frequency axis.

scenes.title: Frequency Downconversion
scenes.narration_summary: Shows how parametric excitation enables megahertz physics with kilohertz modulators via frequency ratio.
scenes.animations: Frequency spectrum visualization with downconversion arrows, magnetic field icons, and parametric subharmonic labels.

scenes.title: Operational Window
scenes.narration_summary: Identifies over-coupled regime with plasma instabilities beyond 0.1 threshold.
scenes.animations: Phase diagram with operational window band, instability icons, and threshold boundaries.

scenes.title: Predictive Peaks
scenes.narration_summary: Predicts observable efficiency peaks at f_mod/f_ci ratios of 1/2, 1/3, 1/4 for experimental validation.
scenes.animations: Experimental prediction plot with labeled peaks, comparison to broadband resonance, and impedance matching curve.
